item.description: From time-to-time members of the group are looking for someone to go with them on a member-organized hike when nothing else is on the calendar - this is one of those times. Ben is looking for someone to hike with him on Sunday April 3 at 8:30 AM. He is thinking of doing either the Osceolas or Whiteface & Passaconaway. Here is what he wrote: "I'm working on skiing the 48 in NH, and these ones are going to melt fast. This is a project to help raise awareness for charity (YES Kids), and the more I get done, the more awareness is raised." Please contact Ben if you have any questions or would like to join him this weekend. Michael
item.name: Hike/Ski the Osceolas or Whiteface & Passaconaway (member organized)
